name: behavior
label: Behavior: Observable actions, emotions, or responses of the individual during the interaction

name: intervention
label: Intervention: Strategies or approaches used to engage the individual, address immediate concerns, or offer support

name: plan
label: Plan: This 'Support Plan' outlines the next steps or follow-up actions, including specific goals, resource referrals, or future check-ins
